about_the_game:
About Combo Critters:
Get ready for a wild and strategic twist on classic checkers with Combo Critters: Battle Checkers! Join Koala King and his quirky animal friends in a fast-paced, combo-driven battle of wits and strategy. This isn’t your ordinary checkers game—it’s a high-energy, tactics-infused showdown where every move counts!

In Combo Critters: Battle Checkers, you’ll face off against a variety of opponents, each with their own unique abilities and play-styles. Use your skills to outmaneuver your foes, chain together epic combos, and unleash powerful special moves to dominate the board. With vibrant visuals, charming characters, and addictive gameplay, this game is perfect for both casual players and strategy enthusiasts.

Key Features:

  • Strategic Gameplay: A fresh take on classic checkers with combo mechanics and special roguelite abilities.

  • Unique Characters: Play as Koala King and other quirky animals, each with their own powers and special abilities.

  • Challenging Opponents: Battle against a variety of ninja opponents each using their unique weapons to take you down.

  • Power-Ups and Combos: Chain moves together to unleash devastating attacks and turn the tide of battle. Roguelite abilities make every round an unique experience. 

  • Casual and Competitive: Easy to pick up and play, but hard to master—perfect for all skill levels.

Why You’ll Love It:
If you’re a fan of hex grid, puzzles, or just casual turn-based roguelite games, this is the game for you. It’s a delightful blend of classic checkers and modern gameplay mechanics, offering hours of fun and challenge. It's a completely new twist on Checkers that we think is a fresh take on the genre.

Coming Soon to Steam!
We will be bringing regular updates on game production as we develop this game. Wishlist Combo Critters : Battle Checkers today and get ready to combo your way to victory! Join our Discord for more updates!
